data:
完美适配：（标记最高适配的版本）
Aplayer:v1.5.7.9
网易云音乐:v8.6.13

应用主动适配：（标记开始适配的版本）
椒盐音乐：v4.5

应用内打开蓝牙歌词（标记最高适配的版本）：
QQ音乐:v10.17.0.11 （另需额外连接蓝牙）
酷狗音乐:v10.9.0
酷我音乐:v10.0.1.0
咪咕音乐:v7.6.1 (另需额外连接蓝牙)
网易云音乐:v7.2.22

每个应用版本需要 Hook 的内容不同, 
所以需要进行人工适配，
其余版本可能同样适配，请自测

带*的功能改动需要重启系统界面
data_en:
Perfect adaptation: (mark the version with the highest adaptation)
Aplayer:v1.5.7.9
NetEase Cloud Music:v8.6.13

App Active Adaptation: (mark the version that starts adaptation)
Salt and Pepper Music : V4.5

Open Bluetooth lyrics in the app (mark the most compatible version):
QQ Music:v10.17.0.11 (additional Bluetooth connection is required)
Kogou Music:v10.9.0
酷 My music: v10.0.1.0
Migu music: v7.6.1 (additional Bluetooth connection is required)
NetEase Cloud Music: v7.2.22

Each application version requires different content of Hook, 
so Manual adaptation is required,
other versions may also be adapted, please self-test

Function changes with * need to restart the system interface
